attributes.action: Stop granting UK citenzenship to people with more than one wife.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The men with two or more wives should not be granted UK citenzenship because bigamy is illegal. Also it costs taxpayers extra money to support these wives and provide large homes for their broods.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
